createAccount.terms_text:
By creating an account on Bazari, you acknowledge that this is a decentralized platform based on blockchain technology, with no central control or institutional guarantees.

You are solely responsible for keeping your seed phrase and password safe. Losing this information may result in permanent loss of access to your account, and Bazari has no technical means to recover it.

Bazari does not collect personal data and does not require any civil identification. All your interaction happens pseudonymously and voluntarily.

By continuing, you agree to the principles of digital sovereignty, individual freedom, and responsibility for your own digital security.
